title: Cohort-2 Starter Course - Challenge - Tell me about your-development-setup

questions.text: Your computer model, memory, disk, processor.
Your internet access and how it works for you. What you can and cannot do.
Do you use a command line tool/shell and which one?
Do you use a simple text editor or a graphical editor or IDE?
Do you use GitHub or other site to publish your work?
Do you use command line git to commit and push work or do you use a program like GitHub Desktop or other graphical tools?
Do you host your finished work so it is visible to the public?
What do you like best about your current setup?
What donâ€™t you like, or what could be better?
